data.title: Go! Arts & Entertainment calendar March 16-22: Bars & Clubs
data.meta_description: AIR Studio Gallery — Doug Alan Wilcox and an open mic, 71 O'Neil St., Kingston, 9 p.m. March 17. www.airstudiogallery.com.
data.text:
AIR Studio Gallery — Doug Alan Wilcox and an open mic, 71 O'Neil St., Kingston, 9 p.m. March 17. www.airstudiogallery.com.

American Glory — Karaoke with DJ Ed, 342 Warren St., Hudson, 8 p.m. March 22. 518-822-1234. www.americanglory.com.

Aqua Terra Grille — Richie Goldberg, 420 N. Middletown, Road, Pearl River, 10 p.m. March 17. 920-1340. www.aquaterragrille.com.

Aroma Thyme Bistro — Bryan Gordon, 165 Canal St., Ellenville, 8 p.m. March 17. Also: Jazz from 8-11 p.m. every Thurs. with John Simon and the Greater Ellenville Jazz Trio, no cover. 647-3000. www.aromathymebistro.com.

Babycakes Cafe — Barbara Dempsey & Company, 1-3 Collegeview Ave., Poughkeepsie, 8 p.m. March 16. Also: Kurt Henry Band, 8 p.m. March 17. Also: Blue in Green Quartet, 7 p.m. March 22. 485-8411. www.babycakescafe.com.

Bacchus — Jonny Monster Band, 4 S. Chestnut St., New Paltz, 10 p.m. March 16. Also: Whiskey Shivers, 9 p.m. March 17. 255-8636. www.bacchusnewpaltz.com.

Also: "The Revue," curated by Sarah Fimm, 9 p.m. March 20. Also: Crooked Booked Open Mic, 8 p.m. March 22. 338-8700. www.bspinfo.net.

Also: Open mic, 8 p.m. March 21. Also: Saturday Night Bluegrass Band, 8 p.m. March 22. Visit Harmony Music Woodstock Facebook page.
